title: Fitts' Task in Virtual Reality using Avatar Hands
personalData: age, gender, and country of birth
purpose: This research aims to study human performance in a pointing task with different avatar hands in virtual reality.
goal: The goal of this research is to understand how visual signals of the body are incorporated into the body scheme.
procedure:
1. You will get a virtual reality headset and will be introduced with virtual hands in the environment
2. You will see a virtual questionnaire. Tap on the table with your index finger to fill out the questionnaire. 
3. In multiple rounds, you have to point at virtual circles highlighted in red. 
4. This procedure will repeat multiple times using different hand conditions.
